pages.name: Mushrooms
pages.text: A depiction of a wild mushroom.

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Mushrooms are their own seeds. They seem to be found in dark and dank places such as caves and abandoned buildings. $(br2)Mushrooms seem to slowly spread when given enough darkness and time.

pages.title: Crop
pages.text: Once harvested a mushroom can be processed in many different ways. The following pages are all the products I have been able to produce from mushrooms.
